alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Mahoning; Portage; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Portage, Trumbull, north central Mahoning, Geauga, east central Cuyahoga and northeastern Summit Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Twinsburg to near Lordstown. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren, Chardon, Solon, Hudson, Niles, Twinsburg, Streetsboro, Macedonia, Cortland, Newton Falls, South Russell, Lordstown, Middlefield, Garrettsville, North Bloomfield, Burton, Mantua, West Farmington, Vienna Center and Leavittsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
